resources.string: (Subtitle is suggested to give further information)

seconds later restore old HDR Priority
Confirm turn off deep color mode
Confirm turn on deep color mode
support 5.1 channels through Dolby Audio playback
support 7.1 channels through Dolby Audio playback
Are you sure to turn on audio only? After selection, the system will black out, and press any key to turn on the screen.
Allow the TV control HDMI devices
Allow the device to wake up TV and let TV the content of the device
Power off HDMI devices when TV is power off
power on TV when HDMI device was waked up
Change HDMI devices\' language to the same with TV
Allow the TV control ARC device
To start Android, enter your password
No lock screen PIN or password
Charge your battery and try again.
Plug in your charger and try again.
You need to set a lock screen PIN or password before you can start encryption.

You can encrypt your accounts, settings, downloaded apps and their data, media, and other files. After you encrypt your tablet, assuming you\u2019ve set up a screen lock (that is, a pattern or numeric PIN or password), you\u2019ll need to unlock the screen to decrypt the tablet every time you power it on. The only other way to decrypt is to perform a factory data reset, erasing all your data.\n\nEncryption takes an hour or more. You must start with a charged battery and keep your tablet plugged in throughout the process. If you interrupt it, you\u2019ll lose some or all of your data
The encryption operation is irreversible and if you interrupt it, you\u2019ll lose data. Encryption takes an hour or more, during which the tablet will restart several times.
Wait while your phone is being encrypted. ^1% complete.
Wait while your phone is being encrypted. Time remaining: ^1
To unlock your phone, turn it off and then on.
Warning: Your device will be wiped after ^1 more failed attempts to be unlocked!

Encryption was interrupted and can\u2019t complete. As a result, the data on your phone is no longer accessible. \n\nTo resume using your phone, you need to perform a factory reset. When you set up your phone after the reset, you\u2019ll have an opportunity to restore any data that was backed up to your Google Account.

The password you entered is correct, but unfortunately your data is corrupt. \n\nTo resume using your phone, you need to perform a factory reset. When you set up your phone after the reset, you\u2019ll have an opportunity to restore any data that was backed up to your Google Account.
To start Android, enter your PIN
To start Android, draw your pattern
Too many incorrect attempts. Try again in %d seconds.
This setting affects all users on this tablet.
If you enter an incorrect work pattern on this attempt, your work profile and associated data will be removed from this device.
Enter your device PIN to continue
Enter your work PIN to continue
Too many incorrect attempts. Your work profile and associated data will be removed from this device.
Enter your device password to continue
Enter your work password to continue
Enter your device PIN to continue. Required after device restarts.
Enter your work PIN to continue. Required after device restarts.
Enter your device password to continue. Required after device restarts.
Enter your work password to continue. Required after device restarts.
If you enter an incorrect work password on this attempt, your work profile and associated data will be removed from this device.
If you enter an incorrect work PIN on this attempt, your work profile and associated data will be removed from this device.
This will erase all picture mode data from your device\'s internal storage. Please choose carefully!!!
Erase all your personal picture mode settings on this device? You can\'t reverse this action!
This will erase all manual gamma data from your device\'s internal storage. Please choose carefully!!!
Erase all your personal manual gamma settings on this device? You can\'t reverse this action!
This will erase all color temperature data from your device\'s internal storage. Please choose carefully!!!

This will erase all color customize data from your device\'s internal storage. Please choose carefully!!!
Erase all your personal color customize settings on this device? You can\'t reverse this action!
Restore default settings will restore the settings menu data to factory condition.
